name: Redeemer

skills.name: Split
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 1 turn if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Elven Blade
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 2.5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
